description: An economic and military cooperative formed by the nations of the northern half of the African continent. Friendly to the http://anidb.net/ch1571 [PLANTs] and hostile to the http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance], the African Community is now effectively http://anidb.net/ch1509 [ZAFT] territory. Nonetheless, a handful of local resistance groups, like the Desert Dawn group based in the Libyan desert, continue to fight a guerilla war against the http://anidb.net/ch1509 [ZAFT] occupation.
name: African Community
